Question: In 1925 this person, then only 14, started dating Johnny DeVita, a 23-year-old local hood.
Hints: Ginger Rogers was a distant maternal cousin of this person's.
This person was quoted as saying, "You cannot teach someone comedy; either they have it or they don't.".
This person was dubbed the "Queen of the Bs" (referring to her many roles in B-films).
